dmca.title: [ABUSE] Website Theft
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 01, 2005 5:21 PM
To: mkissiah@yahoo.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Website Theft

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Michael Kissiah <mkissiah@yahoo.com>
To: manager@lawtrack.com
Date: Monday, February 28, 2005, 11:11:37 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Website Theft

===8<==============Original message text=============== Bill,

We attempted to contact you via email and the phone number listed on your
website without any success.
Websites are copyrighted the moment they are created.
The ORIGINAL archive of our website,
www.einvestigator.com, can be viewed at
http://web.archive.org/web/20030127004509/http://www.einvestigator.com/.
 It is easy to prove that you copied everything from us to create
www.lawtrack.com.  Right down to our privacy policy.  If comparing your
website to our archive is not convincing enough, we can point to numerous
instances of our unique code, and even OUR affiliate links still on your
site.

Please consider this to be a cease-and-desist order and remove the website
from the internet immediately.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.











__________________________________
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Mail - now with 250MB free storage. Learn more.
http://info.mail.yahoo.com/mail_250

===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCJPjsvK/XpJs6oyURAjJHAKCilVOwkDl/QAecO+Sn6OWNfA8EWQCggtN4
EvyMVRpzxTEYwaFasGEyQKQ=
=V39w
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
